<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/threads/{id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Deletes the specified thread. Default to soft deletion.

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
